channel.title: Security, Networks on Secure Delivery
channel.description: Recent content in Security, Networks on Secure Delivery

item.title: What is The Cloud?
item.description: Is this guy really going to do a “What is the cloud?” article in 2020? Yes, he is. I mean, I am. Because I want to talk about the cloud. No, not cloud computing. No, not a series of tubes. Not “just someone else’s computer”. This cloud: This actual cloud. We’ve all seen it thousands of times, and you’ve probably used it a lot if you’re reading this article. You might have seen it in use like:
